item.description:
I have taught five semesters of undergraduate economics at the University of Houston. Teaching has given me an opportunity to learn economics on a deeper level: one only knows they understand a concept if they can communicate it to other students.

In the fall of 2018, I was awarded the exceptional teacher award for receiving high evaluations from students regarding my teaching effectiveness.

Classes I have taught

1) Principles of Macroeconomics, Summer 2018 (teaching effectiveness: 4$.$9$/$5.0)

2) Principles of Macroeconomics, Spring 2018

3) Principles of Microeconomics, Fall 2017

4) Intermediate Macroeconomics, Summer 2017

5) Principles Macroeconomics, Fall 2016

\underline{Teaching Assistant}

I have served as teaching assistant for the following courses:

\begin{enumerate}

\item {\bf{Intermediate Microeconomics}}, Professor Andrea Szabo, Fall 2015

\item {\bf{Applied Econometrics}}, Professor Andrea Szabo, Fall 2015

\item {\bf{Macroeconomic Principles and Money, Banking and Financial Markets}}, Professor Polly Hardee, Spring 2015

\item {\bf{Macroeconomic Principles and Money, Banking and Financial Markets}}, Professor Polly Hardee, Fall 2014

\end{enumerate}
